Let <math display="inline">\Omega \subseteq \mathbb{C}</math> be an open set. And suppose <math display="inline">f</math> is defined on this set. We say that <math display="inline">f</math> is analytic on <math display="inline">\Omega</math> when <math display="inline">f^\prime\left(z\right)</math> exists for all <math display="inline">z \in \Omega</math>
